com.brightcove.mobile.mediaapi
Class QueryRetry

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.mobile.mediaapi.QueryRetry

public class QueryRetry
extends java.lang.Object

Generic retry logic that will retry Media API requests - this can be subclassed to implement your own logic.

resetRetries

public void resetRetries()

shouldRetry

public java.lang.Boolean shouldRetry(java.lang.Exception pException)
Indicates whether the caller can and should retry the given request. Some SDK errors can be successfully retried, whereas others do not make sense to retry (e.g., Video not found).

Parameters:
pException - the exception to check that was thrown from the original API request
Returns:
true if the given request can be retried, false otherwise
